useCase.name: Sponsor Selects and Completes Payment for Summit Sponsorship
useCase.trigger: Sponsor wishes to sponsor a summit

mainSequence.step: Sponsorship Management System fetches summits matching brand criteria
Summit Coordination System provides summit details
Sponsorship Management System lists available summits
Sponsor selects a summit to sponsor
Sponsorship Management System displays sponsorship levels and benefits
Sponsorship Management System provides sponsorship details and payment form
Payment System notifies Sponsorship Management System of payment success
Summit Coordination System assigns sponsor to the selected summit
Sponsorship Management System provides sponsorship confirmation and receipt
